page.title: 01OUR ENVIRONMENT
page.content: {Belper}is extremely varied.There is quick transition{to rural from urban scenery while in the centre there is juxtaposition of{commercial,industrial {and residential}areas.The history of Belper produces fascinating neighbour hoods that are unique, especially the {conservation areas. Away from the town centre are{modern {residential estates}providing quiet areas of the town busy only at peak periods.Inevitably the town centre is much busier particularly{market days. The main{A6 trunk road,}which carries large amounts of lorry traffic, causes that part of the town to be busy for most periods of the day. Inspite of its industrial nature the environment is{not noticeably polluted The central town area is not partic_ ularly interesting in terms of {architecture or housing.
